confirmPayment(bool,bool,uint256).details: confirm both parties want to pay influencer

confirmRefund(bool,bool).details: confirm that both parties are in agreement for refund

depositPayment().details: used for injecting more money for campaigns you want to extend

depositedForInfluencerBalance().details: check amount deposited for an influencer

params._businessConfirmed: business has confirmed in case of overriding payment
params._influencerConfirmed: influencer has confirmed in case of overriding payment

params._postPosted: Protested post must be valid post

removeGracePeriod(bool,bool).details: remove 12 hour grace period to allow shorter payouts
